name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Privacy extension for your personal chat list

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hi! To enhance privacy, this unofficial extension offers the ability to blur or hide chat list content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers the ability to blur or hide your chat list content on https://web.whatsapp.com, ensuring that those around you are unable to easily view your chat list or latest messages.



Notice: This extension is an independent project and has no relationship to WhatsApp. WhatsApp is a trademark of Meta Platforms, Inc.
